headline: Genuine Parts (GPC) Dividend Safety: Is This Auto Parts Giant’s Payout Secure?
summary: Genuine Parts Company (NYSE: GPC) has been paying dividends for decades, but its 2025 financial performance has compressed the margin of safety to concerning levels. With the quarterly dividend now at $1.03 ($4.12 annually) and a 2.99% yield, income investors need to understand what’s happening beneath the surface of this auto parts distributor. The Numbers ...
